reviews.name: Anonymous
reviews.title: our favorite boot
reviews.content: perfectly warm, cute, comfortable. our only problem was that last year it was not watreprrof enough, two prior years they were absolutely perfect for a slushy weather.

reviews.name: Paulina M.
reviews.title: Very warm and flexible
reviews.content: Easy to put, my kid love it

reviews.name: Agata S.
reviews.title: Warm and cozy
reviews.content: Jacket and color is exactly as pictured. It is light, thick as a fleece and has a sweater look/feel on the outside. It will work as a mid layer in winter and on it's own at warmer time. Only complaint is that the zipper on ours is hard to get started for my five year old and even me. Ideally, I would like for the jacket to have a hood. But overall very good quality and sizing is spot on.

reviews.name: Amy B.
reviews.title: Great jacket, but...
reviews.content: Well made, looks good, nice and warm. However, as an outer layer for hiking this fabric is like Velcro, picking up every bit of grass, leaves, seeds, thorns. Takes a bit off effort to get all the stickers out of the fabric.
